Changelog.FirstRunMessage: This beta is meant to test out the metro UI.
Changelog.JustUpdatedMessage: 1. New metro UI. 2. New now playing bar. 3. Search for tracks, albums and artists. 4. Search has infinite scrolling. 5. Fix collection loading bugs. 6. Fix song saving crashing bug. 7. Multilingual support, disabled for testing purposes. 8. Playlists, disabled for testing purposes.
